comment:
The nose and palate remind me of a young bourbon but with a lot of strong oak flavor.  There's a bit of cherry and more oak on the finish.

After drinking Redbreast 12, I realized this one is simiilar on the nose and palate.  They are both labelled as "Pot Distilled", which might be part of it.
Was fine dont need to try again
Very light, caramel and oak come through.
Bourbon like in flavor with a lighter feel from the barley.
